title: Diamond-studded Floral Motif Haaram Set with Matching Jhumkas
materials: Crafted in 18K Rose and White Gold. Features meticulously set
brilliant-cut diamonds with SI clarity and G-H color. Finished with a high-polish to enhance brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram set features an intricate floral design. The necklace is structured with interconnected leafy vines and delicate floral elements that culminate in a central, teardrop-shaped focal point. The matching Jhumkas echo this theme with a detailed chandelier-style design, completing the ensemble.
occasions: and high-profile events. A striking choice for a reception
or any occasion where you wish to make a lasting impression.
description: This unique Haaram set artfully blends modern aesthetics with timeless elegance, crafted in contrasting two-tone gold that amplifies the sparkle of the diamonds. It is a statement piece that can be cherished as a family heirloom for generations. Its lightweight design ensures comfort, and the secure clasp ensures peace of mind.
